overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a combined following of 3,580. Engagement levels vary across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction rates due to professional network relevance. Content frequently revolves around research updates, academic opportunities, and discussions on disinformation.
